content:
Yes, I can do that for you. Here are some research programs in computer science and engineering at the University of Alberta:

1. Machine Learning and Data Analytics Lab - this lab focuses on research in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data analytics.

2. Human-Computer Interaction Lab - this lab focuses on researching the interaction between humans and machines and developing more user-friendly technology.

3. Computer Graphics Lab - this lab focuses on 3D modeling, animation, visualization, and virtual reality.

4. Computing Education Research Group - this research group focuses on improving computer science education.

5. Embedded Systems Lab - this lab focuses on researching real-time systems, embedded systems, and wireless sensor networks.

6. Network Systems Lab - this lab focuses on research in computer networks, including network architecture, protocols, and security.

7. Artificial Intelligence Research Lab - this lab conducts research in various areas of AI, such as machine learning, natural language processing, and decision making.

These are just a few examples of research programs in computer science and engineering at the University of Alberta. I suggest you visit their website for more information.
